title: Buy groceries.
description: I need to stock up on some essentials like milk, eggs, bread, and cheese. I also want to get some fruits and vegetables for healthy snacks.

title: Call mom.
description: I haven't talked to her in a while and I want to catch up on how she's doing. I hope she's not too worried about me.

title: Finish project.
description: I have a deadline coming up for a big assignment at work and I need to put the final touches on it. I hope my boss likes it and gives me a good feedback.

title: Clean the house
description: It's been a mess lately and I need to tidy up. I want to vacuum the carpets, dust the furniture, and wash the dishes. Maybe I'll light some candles and play some music to make it more fun.

title: Watch a movie
description: After a long day of work and chores, I deserve some relaxation. I want to watch a comedy or a romance to lift my mood. Maybe I'll order some pizza and popcorn too.

title: Clean the garage
description: It's been a mess for months and I need to make some space for the new bike.

title: Exercise for 30 minutes
description: I need to stay healthy and fit, especially during the pandemic.
